availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Paris M. C. Teater (farmer, mercer county)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Ann Teater. Father of Misner Teater, Sephronia E. Teater, and Rebecca Teater. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 54.
Find A Grave, "Paris M. C. Teater (June 15, 1820-December 29, 1879)," Memorial #70947777, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/70947777 (accessed May 21, 2018).
